careerSummary.title: Career Summary
careerSummary.description: Bilingual (Japanese/English) Senior IT Software Engineer with extensive experience in backend API development, architecture design, and team leadership at major web IT companies. Certified in Kubernetes (CKS, CKA, CKAD) and holding TOEIC 900 score with various IT certifications.
